subject.topcClas: RESPONSE TO THE ANNOUNCEMENT OF EVACUATION

stdyInfo.abstract: Although the probability of a nuclear accident is small, each community that lives and works near the nuclear facility has to act responsibly and prepare for this option. For this purpose, a study on the preparedness of the population, institutions and businesses on the evacuation in the event of a nuclear accident, that live, operate, respectively in the 3km-zone around the NPP was carried out. Public poll was conducted among residents and 12 in-depth interviews with leaders in twelve major companies and institutions. The main objective of the study was to obtain objective findings on preparedness to evacuate in the municipality of NPP and on this basis to give recommendations that will contribute to the improvement of planning and action in the event of a nuclear accident, especially for faster and more effective announcement and implementation of evacuation.

sumDscr.universe: 1) The target population is residents over the age of 18 who permanently live in chosen settlements located within a 3-km zone around the Krško NPP. In the case when only a part of the settlement is located in the border area, the sampling took into account the whole settlement.

(2) The target population of interviews was health, educational and childcare institutions and companies located within the 3-kilometer zone around the Krško NPP and which have a special role and competence in the evacuation of the population, or are located directly next to the Krško NPP. Thus, the sample was covered by the following institutions: Pharmacy Krško, private company SOP International, Jurij Dalmatin Primary school, Leskovec Primary School in Krško, School Center Krško, Krško House of Elderly, Hotel City, VIPAP Videm company, KOSTAK Company, Krško Kindergarten, Health Center Krško and the company LEVAS Krško.

dataCollector.affiliation: Fakulteta za družbene vede = Faculty of Social Sciences

dataColl.dataCollector: Obramboslovni raziskovalni center = Defence Studies Research Centre
dataColl.sampProc: 1) Sampling was carried out by the Statistical Office of the Republic of Slovenia. The statistical characteristics of the realized sample match the characteristics of a simple random sample of N = 1,000 persons, aged eighteen and over.
dataColl.collSitu: (1) Data collection was carried out using the method of personal interview using a standardized survey instrument. In the framework of preparations for the implementation of the research, the research group has set up procedures for the execution and supervision of fieldwork. The method of carrying out the survey was determined, including the uniform phase of the field phase, the method of survey and the manner of surveillance of the interviewer's work. All potential respondents included in the sample were previously informed that there is a possibility that they will be visited by the interviewer, as well as the essential objectives of the study. At the end of the fieldwork, on the basis of random selection of a certain number of respondents, it was verified that they were actually surveyed. All participation in the survey was confirmed.

(2) 12 in-depth interviews with leaders in twelve major companies and institutions operating in the area of the municipality of Krško were carried out. Interviews were conducted with principals of schools and kindergarten, company directors or a person in the company responsable for protection and rescue. The average interview lasted 30 minutes.

anlyInfo.respRate: 1) The number of completed questionnaires is 502 and the number of units in the sample is 1000. Thus, the response rate is 50.2%.
2) For each of the selected organisations there was one respondent.

method.stdyClas: 8 - theoretically or practically important studies, studies that fill the research gap or have many implications for a wide range of practical problems, long term scholarly value

var.name: V602
var.labl: Zaupanje medijem, da bi ustrezno poročali o jedrski nesreči in natančno prenašali navodila pristojnih ustanov?

qstn.qstnLit: Koliko zaupate ali ne zaupate medijem, da bi ustrezno poročali o jedrski nesreči in natančno prenašali navodila pristojnih ustanov? Ocenite na lestvici od 1 do 4 kjer 1 pomeni, da sploh ne zaupate, in 4, da popolnoma zaupate.

var.name: V603
var.labl: Mnenje o pripravljenosti pristojnih ustanov na obomočju občine za ukrepanje v primeru jedrske nesreče?

qstn.qstnLit: Kakšna je po vašem mnenju pripravljenost pristojnih ustanov na območju občine za ukrepanje v primeru jedrske nesreče? Ocenite na lestvici od 1 do 4, kjer 1 pomeni, da je njihova pripravljenost povsem neustrezna, in 4, da je povsem ustrezna.
